title: 怎么取消分子重组仪的做依配方
author: wschenxu

replies.author: wschenxu
replies.txt_content:
坑货之一 发表于 2016-3-20 19:18
敲掉试试看
我指的是 放进去铁不能做依  怎么弄成这样的

replies.author: wahaha216
replies.txt_content:
\.minecraft\config\AdvancedSolarPanel_MTRecipes.cfg

minecraft:iron_ingot:1; IC2:itemOreIridium:1; 9000000
删掉这行试试
